explaination: A request has been successfully fulfilled.
A request has been successfully fulfilled and resulted in a creation of a new resource.
A request has been successfully processed but does not need to return any data.
A request has been made to a malformed URL.
A request has been made with a malformed JSON body.
One of the parameters specified is invalid or missing.
Bad OAuth request (wrong consumer key, bad nonce, expired timestamp, etc.). Error message should indicate which one and why.
The user is not permitted to make the given request.
The resource you requested does not exist.
The request method is not permitted.
The server refused to service the request because the entity of the request is in a format not supported by the requested resource for the requested method.
Your post/put request was denied (attempt to update an order status to unavailable value...).
An unexpected error has occurred in the API.
